===Alternative forms===
Note distinctions between whether the central vertical stroke in 角 extends to the bottom (as in [[用]]), which is sometimes seen in simplified, or stops at the last horizontal line (like [[田]] with 2 legs on the sides), which is used in traditional,Japanese, and some simplified – see the etymology.
